books.title: Operating Systems: Three Easy Pieces
books.author: Remzi & Andrea
books.desc: A practical, modular approach to OS concepts.

books.title: Automate the Boring Stuff with Python
books.author: Al Sweigart
books.desc: Hands-on Python for automation tasks.

books.title: The C Programming Language
books.author: Brian W. Kernighan, Dennis M. Ritchie
books.desc: The classic and authoritative guide to C programming, written by its creators. Essential for mastering the language.

books.title: Head First C
books.author: David Griffiths, Dawn Griffiths
books.desc: A hands-on, visual approach to learning C programming for beginners and intermediates.

books.title: Think Python: How to Think Like a Computer Scientist
books.author: Allen Downey
books.desc: An approachable introduction to programming and problem-solving using Python.

books.title: Python Crash Course
books.author: Eric Matthes
books.desc: A fast-paced introduction to Python programming with practical examples and projects.

books.title: Fluent Python
books.author: Luciano Ramalho
books.desc: Deep dive into Pythonâ€™s core features and idiomatic design. Ideal for writing clean and efficient Python code.

books.title: Introduction to Algorithms (CLRS)
books.author: Thomas H. Cormen, Charles E. Leiserson, Ronald L. Rivest, Clifford Stein
books.desc: The gold standard textbook on algorithms. Detailed and mathematically rigorous.

books.title: The Algorithm Design Manual
books.author: Steven S. Skiena
books.desc: Balances algorithm theory and practice with real-world case studies.

books.title: Grokking Algorithms
books.author: Aditya Bhargava
books.desc: A friendly, illustrated introduction to data structures and algorithms.

books.title: Algorithms
books.author: Robert Sedgewick, Kevin Wayne
books.desc: An accessible and practical introduction to algorithms with visual explanations and Java examples.

books.title: Data Structures and Algorithm Analysis in C
books.author: Mark Allen Weiss
books.desc: A classic introduction to implementing and analyzing algorithms and data structures in C.

books.title: Operating System Concepts
books.author: Abraham Silberschatz, Peter B. Galvin, Greg Gagne
books.desc: Known as the 'Dinosaur Book', this is the most widely used OS textbook covering processes, threads, memory, and file systems.

books.title: Operating Systems: Three Easy Pieces (OSTEP)
books.author: Remzi H. Arpaci-Dusseau, Andrea C. Arpaci-Dusseau
books.desc: A clear and modern introduction to OS concepts, available free online.

books.title: Modern Operating Systems
books.author: Andrew S. Tanenbaum, Herbert Bos
books.desc: Explains the principles and design of operating systems in depth with modern case studies.

books.title: Computer Organization and Design
books.author: David A. Patterson, John L. Hennessy
books.desc: The standard textbook for understanding how computer hardware and software interact.

books.title: Computer Architecture: A Quantitative Approach
books.author: John L. Hennessy, David A. Patterson
books.desc: A deep and performance-focused textbook on computer architecture, used in top universities worldwide.

books.title: Digital Design and Computer Architecture
books.author: David Harris, Sarah Harris
books.desc: Builds from logic gates to complete CPUs with hands-on exercises.

books.title: Computer Networking: A Top-Down Approach
books.author: James F. Kurose, Keith W. Ross
books.desc: A practical introduction to computer networking, starting from applications down to the physical layer.

books.title: Data Communications and Networking
books.author: Behrouz A. Forouzan
books.desc: An accessible, visually rich textbook for beginners learning network protocols and architectures.

books.title: Discrete Mathematics and Its Applications
books.author: Kenneth H. Rosen
books.desc: The go-to textbook for discrete math, logic, and proofs essential to computer science.

books.title: Mathematics for Computer Science (MIT)
books.author: Eric Lehman, F. Thomson Leighton, Albert R. Meyer
books.desc: MIT's official discrete mathematics textbook for computer science, available free online.

books.title: Linear Algebra and Its Applications
books.author: Gilbert Strang
books.desc: A fundamental textbook for understanding linear algebra concepts used in computer graphics, ML, and data science.

books.title: Calculus
books.author: James Stewart
books.desc: A comprehensive guide to calculus covering differential, integral, and multivariable calculus with examples.

books.title: Introduction to the Theory of Computation
books.author: Michael Sipser
books.desc: A clear, rigorous, and elegant introduction to automata theory, computability, and complexity.

books.title: Computers and Intractability: A Guide to the Theory of NP-Completeness
books.author: Michael R. Garey, David S. Johnson
books.desc: The definitive reference for understanding NP-completeness and computational hardness.

books.title: Structure and Interpretation of Computer Programs (SICP)
books.author: Harold Abelson, Gerald Jay Sussman, Julie Sussman
books.desc: A foundational text that teaches how to think like a computer scientist using Scheme and abstraction.

books.title: The Art of Computer Programming
books.author: Donald E. Knuth
books.desc: An advanced multi-volume encyclopedia on algorithms, programming, and mathematical analysis by the father of algorithmic analysis.

books.title: Artificial Intelligence: A Modern Approach
books.author: Stuart Russell, Peter Norvig
books.desc: Comprehensive textbook covering all aspects of modern AI.

books.title: Deep Learning
books.author: Ian Goodfellow, Yoshua Bengio, Aaron Courville
books.desc: The definitive textbook on deep learning theory and practice.

books.title: Reinforcement Learning: An Introduction
books.author: Richard S. Sutton, Andrew G. Barto
books.desc: The foundational textbook for reinforcement learning concepts and algorithms.

books.title: Code: The Hidden Language of Computer Hardware and Software
books.author: Charles Petzold
books.desc: Explains how computers work from electrical circuits to high-level programming, in simple narrative form.
